plot: A news spoof featuring comically bizzare newflashes, an eccentric German film critic, a neurotic and often angry disc jockey, and various celebrities being mocked.
plot_en: A news spoof featuring comically bizzare newflashes, an eccentric German film critic, a neurotic and often angry disc jockey, and various celebrities being mocked.
plot_es: A news spoof featuring comically bizzare newflashes, an eccentric German film critic, a neurotic and often angry disc jockey, and various celebrities being mocked.
title: The Itch
